Lorenco Trichardt is an Independent Consultant in South Africa.  He has been involved with Linux since the early 90's.  

He is an ITA Certified Linux administrator and keen Ubuntu supporter :-)
He converted to Ubuntu in 2005 and does not intend to move to any other distro for now.

He is currently involved with projects for IBM in South Africa.
